hh3cDldp2.name: hh3cDldp2

revisions.description: Initial version of this MIB module.

hh3cDldp2.contactinfo: Platform Team Hangzhou H3C Technologies. Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip: 100085
hh3cDldp2.description: Device Link Detection Protocol (DLDP) MIB. Device Link Detection Protocol is a private Layer 2 protocol, which can be used to detect and shut down unidirectional links (fiber or copper links) to avoid network problems.

hh3cDldp2GlobalEnable.name: hh3cDldp2GlobalEnable
hh3cDldp2GlobalEnable.description: Enable(true) or disable(false) DLDP on the device.

hh3cDldp2Interval.name: hh3cDldp2Interval
hh3cDldp2Interval.description: Indicates the advertisement packet sending interval.

hh3cDldp2AuthMode.name: hh3cDldp2AuthMode
hh3cDldp2AuthMode.description: Indicates the authentication mode. unknown: cannot be determined for some reason. none: not authenticated. simple: authenticated by a clear text password. md5: authenticated by MD5 digest.

hh3cDldp2AuthPassword.name: hh3cDldp2AuthPassword
hh3cDldp2AuthPassword.description: Indicates the authentication password. Setting the password to a zero-length octet string means deleting the password. When read, it always returns a zero-length octet string.

hh3cDldp2UniShutdown.name: hh3cDldp2UniShutdown
hh3cDldp2UniShutdown.description: Indicates the shutdown mode when a unidirectional link has been detected. unknown: cannot be determined for some reason. auto: the port will be shutdown automatically. manual: the port must be shut down manually.

hh3cDldp2PortConfigTable.name: hh3cDldp2PortConfigTable
hh3cDldp2PortConfigTable.description: This table contains all ports that support DLDP.

hh3cDldp2PortConfigEntry.name: hh3cDldp2PortConfigEntry
hh3cDldp2PortConfigEntry.description: This entry describes a port that supports DLDP.

hh3cDldp2PortEnable.name: hh3cDldp2PortEnable
hh3cDldp2PortEnable.description: Enable(true) or disable(false) DLDP on a port.

hh3cDldp2PortStatusTable.name: hh3cDldp2PortStatusTable
hh3cDldp2PortStatusTable.description: This table contains all ports enabled with DLDP.

hh3cDldp2PortStatusEntry.name: hh3cDldp2PortStatusEntry
hh3cDldp2PortStatusEntry.description: This entry describes a port enabled with DLDP.

hh3cDldp2PortOperStatus.name: hh3cDldp2PortOperStatus
hh3cDldp2PortOperStatus.description: Indicates the DLDP operating status on the port. unknown: cannot be determined for some reason. initial: DLDP is not globally enabled. inactive: physical status of the port is down. unidirectional: all neighbors of the port are in 'unconfirmed' status. bidirectional: more than one neighbor of the port is in 'confirmed' status.

hh3cDldp2PortLinkStatus.name: hh3cDldp2PortLinkStatus
hh3cDldp2PortLinkStatus.description: Indicates the DLDP link status of the port. unknown: cannot be determined for some reason. down: the DLDP link status of the port is down. up: the DLDP link status of the port is up. If the port operating status is not 'inactive', 'unidirectional', or 'bidirectional', it always returns 'unknown'.

hh3cDldp2NeighborTable.name: hh3cDldp2NeighborTable
hh3cDldp2NeighborTable.description: This table contains all port's neighbors.

hh3cDldp2NeighborEntry.name: hh3cDldp2NeighborEntry
hh3cDldp2NeighborEntry.description: This entry describes a port's neighbors.

hh3cDldp2NeighborBridgeMac.name: hh3cDldp2NeighborBridgeMac
hh3cDldp2NeighborBridgeMac.description: Indicates the bridge MAC address of a neighbor.

hh3cDldp2NeighborPortIndex.name: hh3cDldp2NeighborPortIndex
hh3cDldp2NeighborPortIndex.description: Indicates the port index of a neighbor.

hh3cDldp2NeighborStatus.name: hh3cDldp2NeighborStatus
hh3cDldp2NeighborStatus.description: Indicates the status of a neighbor. unknown: cannot be determined for some reason. unconfirmed: unidirectional communication between the port and its neighbor. confirmed: bidirectional communication between the port and its neighbor.

hh3cDldp2NeighborAgingTime.name: hh3cDldp2NeighborAgingTime
hh3cDldp2NeighborAgingTime.description: Indicates the aging time of a neighbor. If the neighbor status is not 'confirmed', it always returns 0.

hh3cDldp2TrapUniLink.name: hh3cDldp2TrapUniLink
hh3cDldp2TrapUniLink.description: This trap is generated when DLDP detects a unidirectional link, ifIndex and ifDescr identify the port.

hh3cDldp2TrapBidLink.name: hh3cDldp2TrapBidLink
hh3cDldp2TrapBidLink.description: This trap is generated when DLDP detects a bidirectional link, ifIndex and ifDescr identify the port.
